channel.title: Flamenco on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in Flamenco on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Evening in Seville - Spain
item.description: Back from Cordoba around 4PM in the afternoon to Seville. We went to buy ticket for next phase of journey that was between Seville and Lisbon. Oh! That was too hot and sweating experience to summarize in short. Back to hotel being boiled with afternoon heat we got freshen up. We started our evening stroll starting from Puente de San Telmo towards Triana around 9PM, the other side of the river a common Seville neighborhood.
